1~f23eaaa7-d82c-4032-afa3-7e6efaee4700~SMPDFZTB7QQTGUHJ~Dove Intense Repair Shampoo~11 Apr, 2013~5~~Shruti Mukherjee~http://www.flipkart.com/reviews/f23eaaa7-d82c-4032-afa3-7e6efaee4700~~What can i say about this product? First shampoo lavishly, and wash off. again take a little amount and shampoo again. this time it will lather lavishly. Leave it on for10 minutes. I know this might be tiresome, but you can do other things like brushing and scrubbing in the mean while.  This is because the first time you shampoo, you're removing dirt from your hair. And the next time you're actually shampooing it.  Then use the conditioner and leave it on for 15 minutes. It gives the best results. 1~R80CBDBU1G245~B012NTJJTI~Pantene Hairfall Control Shampoo, 675ml~2017-10-09~4.0 out of 5 stars~~Anshulika~http://www.amazon.in/gp/customer-reviews/R80CBDBU1G245/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B012NTJJTI~~Good enough shampoo for daily use. Purchased this shampoo and conditioner from the range as I was facing hair fall issue. Found this shampoo to be gentle and pleasant smelling. Creamy formula leaves hair soft without causing any dryness. Since, it's a creamy formula it doesn't cause any hair breakage while washing due to dryness. After using this shampoo, my hair feel really soft, bouncy and shiny to touch. However, my only con with this shampoo is it doesn't magically stops hair fall as it claims. While, it does prevents further hair fall and prevents hair breakage and in this way is better than other shampoos but in no way it would make your hair grow or stop your hair fall at once. But then it's very rare to find a shampoo that can stop hair fall altogether. There are only shampoos that cause more or shampoos that cause less hair fall. For hair fall issue, I have found, serums, lotions, and oils are the best solution as they tend to stay on your scalp for longer to work their magic. So if you're looking for a shampoo that prevents hair fall due to breakage and dryness or one that cause lesser hair fall, go for this one!~1200117

1~R3EF1SO9C3KTY3~B012NTK1TU~Pantene Lively Clean Shampoo, 400ml~2017-08-08~1.0 out of 5 stars~~runes6333~http://www.amazon.in/gp/customer-reviews/R3EF1SO9C3KTY3/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B012NTK1TU~~Let me start off by saying that i didn't buy it from amazon but felt compelled to write a review for those who have the same issues as me. I have extremely oily scalp and i really wanted to give this shampoo a try as i had read some pretty good reviews of this shampoo attributing to it's fantastic cleansing abilities.  It was a bad idea. This did clean my scalp of all the junk and oil and sebum etc but at the same time it gave me dandruff and caused massive hair loss from the roots. I'm not sure what went wrong exactly because it is just a shampoo but i have never experienced anything like this before with any shampoo before. I continued to wash my hair with this for 15 days thinking my hair would adapt to it, but that made things worse. Now i was losing hair faster and My dandruff had taken the worst form. I had to rush to the pharmacy and buy a medicated anti dandruff shampoo which then calmed my scalp down and then i retired to the previous shampoo that i had been using. Garnier ultra blends recitalising shampoo (the 5 herbs one) much better and my hair fall has siezed completely. I will not experiment with this brand EVER again.~1200127
